mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, visittime, visitor, usercode, username, finishtime, hfyd, organization, myd, postperson, hfresult, status, extension, remark
mapper.insert: insert into KQDS_EXTENSION (SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, visittime, visitor, usercode, username, finishtime, hfyd, organization, myd, postperson, hfresult, status, extension, remark) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hfyd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hfresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into KQDS_EXTENSION
SEQ_ID,
createuser,
createtime,
visittime,
visitor,
usercode,
username,
finishtime,
hfyd,
organization,
myd,
postperson,
hfresult,
status,
extension,
remark,

#{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{visittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update KQDS_EXTENSION
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visittime = #{visittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitor = #{visitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hfyd = #{hfyd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
myd = #{myd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postperson = #{postperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hfresult = #{hfresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extension = #{extension,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_EXTENSION set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visittime = #{visittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitor = #{visitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hfyd = #{hfyd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, myd = #{myd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postperson = #{postperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hfresult = #{hfresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extension = #{extension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select t.seq_id,t.jhname from kqds_extension_type t where 1=1
and t.organization = #{organization}
and t.status = #{planstatus}
and t.seq_id in ( select extension from KQDS_EXTENSION where visittime >= #{vtime1} )
and t.seq_id in ( select extension from KQDS_EXTENSION where visittime <= #{vtime2} )
and t.jhname = like '%' + #{extension} + '%'
and (t.createuser in (${visualstaff}) or t.seq_id in ( select extension from KQDS_EXTENSION where visitor in (${visualstaff}))) order by t.createtime desc
select count(1) as wei from KQDS_EXTENSION where extension = (select extension from KQDS_EXTENSION where seq_id = #{_parameter}) and status = 0

select t.jhname, per1.user_name as createuser, v.createtime, v.hfresult, v.visittime, v.extension, v.remark as extenremark, v.seq_id, u.usercode, u.username, u.sex, u.age, u.phonenumber1, v.finishtime, v.hfyd, v.status, v.organization, kcit1.dict_name as myd, per2.user_name as visitor, visitor as visitorid, (select count(1) from KQDS_Member where usercode =v.usercode ) as memberno, u.remark from KQDS_Extension v LEFT JOIN KQDS_UserDocument u on u.UserCode = v.usercode LEFT JOIN KQDS_Extension_Type t on v.extension = t.seq_id LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON per1 on per1.SEQ_ID = u.createuser LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON per2 on per2.SEQ_ID = v.visitor LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT kcit1 on v.myd = kcit1.seq_id where 1=1 and v.seq_Id = #{seqId}

select t.*,p.USER_NAME as cjr,
(select e.visittime from KQDS_EXTENSION e where e.extension = t.seq_id limit 0,1) as vtime
(select top 1 e.visittime from KQDS_EXTENSION e where e.extension = t.seq_id) as vtime
from kqds_extension_type t LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON p on p.SEQ_ID = t.createuser where 1=1 and t.organization = #{organization} and t.seq_id in ( select extension from KQDS_EXTENSION where visittime >= #{visittime} ) and (t.createuser in (${visualstaff}) or t.seq_id in ( select extension from KQDS_EXTENSION where visitor in (${visualstaff}))) order by t.createtime desc
select usercode,visitor,username,visittime from KQDS_EXTENSION where 1=1 and visittime <= #{visittime} and status = 0 group by usercode order by createtime desc
